Title: Clarifies the time in which the public service commission must act upon certain petitions
Summary: Clarifies the time in which the public service commission must act upon certain petitions; requires reporting to the legislature.
LawCode: Add ยง28, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to clarifying the mandatory time within which the public service commission must act upon petitions submitted by regulated entities and the citizenry
